caption: Relating to sexually violent predators, to the Texas Civil Commitment Office, and to the prosecution of the offense of harassment by sexually violent predators and other persons confined in certain facilities; amending and harmonizing certain statute of limitations provisions; amending certain sex offender registration requirements; changing the eligibility for community supervision, parole, and mandatory supervision for sexually violent predators; creating a criminal offense; increasing criminal penalties.
summary: This bill enhances restrictions and penalties for sexually violent predators who are civilly committed. It requires consecutive sentencing for multiple offenses, prohibits parole/community supervision eligibility, mandates 90-day sex offender registration check-ins, and restricts certain employment activities. While not specifically targeting Chinese immigrants, these provisions would apply to any civilly committed sexually violent predator regardless of national origin.
translation: 该法案加强了对民事监禁的性暴力犯罪者的限制和处罚。它要求对多项罪行连续判刑，禁止假释/社区监督资格，强制要求每90天进行性犯罪者登记检查，并限制某些就业活动。虽然没有特别针对中国移民，但这些规定将适用于任何被民事监禁的性暴力犯罪者，无论其国籍如何。
